text: wa'awjad min al'aneam ma hu mhyaa lilhuml ealayh likabrih wartifaeah kal'iibla, waminha ma hu mhyaa lighayr alhamal lisaghrih waqarbih min al'ard kalbaqr walghanima, kuluu mimaa 'abahah allah lakum wa'aetakumuh min hadhih al'aneami, wala tuharimuu ma ahll allah minha atbaeana litaraq alshaytani, kama faeal almushrikuna. 'iina alshaytan lakum eaduun zahir aleadawat
